column2: ['Ethereum', 'Ethereum Rises 4.2% as Institutional Demand Surges', 'Ethereum climbed to $3,450 in early trading Wednesday, marking its strongest single-day gain in three weeks. The rally comes amid reports that several large asset managers have increased their ETH allocations. Trading volume jumped 38% over the past 24 hours across major exchanges.', 'synthetic_claude', '2025-01-17T10:15:00Z']

['Ethereum', 'Ethereum Network Completes Major Upgrade to Reduce Gas Fees', 'The Ethereum blockchain successfully implemented the Dencun upgrade at 14:55 UTC, introducing proto-danksharding to lower transaction costs. Developers estimate the update could reduce layer-2 fees by up to 90% for end users. The network processed the fork without any reported technical issues.', 'synthetic_claude', '2025-01-17T10:30:00Z']

['Ethereum', 'SEC Approves Three New Ethereum Staking Products for Retail Investors', 'The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission greenlit staking-enabled Ethereum investment products from major issuers on Thursday. The approval marks a significant policy shift after years of regulatory uncertainty around proof-of-stake rewards. Industry analysts expect the decision to unlock billions in institutional capital.', 'synthetic_claude', '2025-01-17T11:00:00Z']

['Ethereum', "Ethereum's Market Cap Crosses $400 Billion Milestone", "Ethereum's total market capitalization exceeded $400 billion for the first time since April 2022, driven by sustained price appreciation. The second-largest cryptocurrency now represents approximately 18% of the total crypto market value. ETH has gained 22% over the past month, outperforming Bitcoin's 15% advance.", 'synthetic_claude', '2025-01-17T11:45:00Z']

['Ethereum', "BlackRock's Ethereum ETF Sees Record $280M Daily Inflow", "BlackRock's iShares Ethereum Trust recorded its largest single-day inflow since launch, attracting $280 million in new capital on Tuesday. The surge reflects growing institutional appetite for regulated crypto exposure following recent macroeconomic data. Competing Ethereum ETFs from Fidelity and Grayscale also posted strong inflows.", 'synthetic_claude', '2025-01-17T12:20:00Z']

['Ethereum', 'Ethereum Developers Set Target Date for Next Major Network Upgrade', "Core Ethereum developers agreed during Thursday's consensus call to target Q3 2025 for the Pectra upgrade implementation. The update will introduce validator changes and account abstraction improvements to enhance user experience. Testing on public testnets is expected to begin in April.", 'synthetic_claude', '2025-01-17T13:10:00Z']

['Ethereum', 'JPMorgan Launches Ethereum-Based Bond Settlement Platform', 'JPMorgan Chase announced the production launch of its blockchain-based bond settlement system built on a private Ethereum fork. The Onyx Digital Assets platform will initially handle repo transactions for institutional clients. The bank cited efficiency gains of up to 40% compared to traditional settlement rails.', 'synthetic_claude', '2025-01-17T14:00:00Z']

['Ethereum', 'Ethereum Options Open Interest Hits All-Time High Ahead of FOMC Meeting', "Open interest in Ethereum options contracts reached $12.8 billion, surpassing the previous record set in November 2021. Traders are positioning for increased volatility surrounding next week's Federal Reserve policy announcement."]
